title: Nevis, world’s most romantic place on Earth, is now easier to reach
text:
New Codeshare Agreement Between JetBlue and Seaborne Airlines Means Visitors Can Easily Fly Directly in to Nevis Nevis, world’s most romantic place on Earth, is now easier to reach 
CHARLESTOWN, Nevis - Nevis, known as one of the most romantic places on earth, is one of the most unspoiled and relaxing islands in the Caribbean offering visitors a step-change in their frenetic pace of life, and now is now easier to reach with a new codeshare agreement between JetBlue and Seaborne Airlines. Visitors can seamlessly and smoothly transfer via San Juan Luis Muñoz Marin International Airport (SJU), Puerto Rico to flights arriving directly in Nevis at Vance W. Armory Airport (NEV). Meaning visitors land directly in the tranquility of paradise Nevis offers. 
This exciting new codeshare means customers flying from the US to Nevis with JetBlue and Seaborne will enjoy the benefit of traveling on a single ticket. Passengers benefit from one-stop check-in at departure airport, direct baggage transfer to the final destination, and conveniently timed connections with all flights available to purchase on JetBlue.com or online travel booking websites. The codeshare removes all the hassle of a transfer, simply allowing passengers to enjoy their brief layover at the airport 
JetBlue is the largest US carrier in to the Caribbean, as well as being the largest carrier at San Juan’s International Airport, offering multiple flights a day from 9 major gateways in the US including New York, New Jersey, Massachusetts, Washington, DC, Florida and Illinois. Seaborne offers flights direct flights between San Juan and Nevis four days a week, taking just over an hour, meaning this easy connection at San Juan airport is the ideal way to arrive in Nevis. Additionally, passengers travelling back to the US will complete their customs in San Juan meaning that they will arrive as domestic passengers upon arrival at their final destination making the entire travel process much smoother. 
“The new codeshare between JetBlue and Seaborne Airlines is excellent news for Nevis and for visitors. While Nevis is the gem of the Caribbean, there are no direct flights from the contiguous US to our lovely gem. This new codeshare only makes travel more seamless and smooth for visitors, meaning they will arrive relaxed and ready to embrace the tranquility that we are renowned for by cutting out the difficulties of not travelling on one single ticket,” said the St. Kitts and Nevis Minister of Foreign Affairs and Aviation, Honorable Mark Brantley of this news. Further explaining, “With tickets being available to easily purchase on the JetBlue website as well as all online travel booking websites, ultimately the visibility of Nevis as a top Caribbean destination in the US market is drastically raised. We have already seen the positive effects of this codeshare and in my capacity as Minister of Tourism for Nevis, I look forward to this thriving positive relationship between the two airlines, and as a result, the Federation of St. Kitts and Nevis.” 
Covering just 36 square miles, Nevis is renowned for offering visitors a different experience, where there is no hustle and bustle, giant cruise ships or major casinos. Instead, Nevis offers fantastic beaches, water sports, horseback riding, mountain biking, hiking, and natural wildlife that includes green vervet monkeys. Aptly described as being vividly green with blue skies, clean air and long empty beaches, Nevis has a pace of life that encourages you to stop and appreciate all the natural beauty surrounding visitors. Famed for its charm and the easy-going friendliness and hospitality of its people, Nevis is the perfect escape from the daily stress of life for everyone. 
Visitors can book their travel to the paradise that Nevis offers today on JetBlue.com or their preferred online travel booking website. 
About Nevis 
Nevis is part of the Federation of St. Kitts & Nevis and is located in the Leeward Islands of the West Indies. Conical in shape with a volcanic peak at its center known as Nevis Peak, the island is the birthplace of the founding father of the United States, Alexander Hamilton. The weather is typical of most of the year with temperatures in the low to mid-80s°F / mid 20-30s°C, cool breezes and low chances of precipitation. Air transportation is easily available with connections from Puerto Rico, and St. Kitts.
